Literature.Title: Bactericidal activities and Action mechanism of the Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Hylin a1 and its analog peptides against Acinetobacter baumannii infection.
Literature.Author: Park HJ, Kang HK, Park E, Kim MK, Park Y
